messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Digest Number 775
messages.msgSnippet: Yes Edgar, they are VERY good. In the english lagnguage I find that his, Anthony Bryants, and Mitsuo Kures books are the best. In my opinion, The Samurai
messages.messageBody:
Yes Edgar, they are VERY good. In the english lagnguage I find that his,
Anthony Bryants, and Mitsuo Kures books are the best. In my opinion,
The Samurai Source Book and Samurai Warfare are Turnbulls two best
works. I recommend them all however!
Dan

Edgar Gallego wrote:

> Hi Dan,
>

> haven't
> read their yet, are them good?
>
> Edgar.

Thanks for the info. Turnbull writes a lot of books about Japan, I haven't
